titleSection.name: UrbanCode uBuild Integration for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds from UBuild.

descriptionSection.description: UrbanCode provides integration as as part of their Anthill Pro and UBuild products. It provides steps for the build to comment, create, and resolve defects found in VersionOne and publish defects that were addressed in the build to the Issues tab.
